    CoinChange
    state: state[i], minimum # of coins sum up to amount i start state: state[0] end state: state[amount] aim state: state[amount] state transition: min(state[i - coins[j]] + 1) = state[i]

    DecodeWays

    state[i][2] // 0 not use, 1 use use nums[i] state[i][0] = nums[i] + state[i - 1][0] if nums[i - 1] + 1 = nums[i] = nums[i] + max (state[i - 1][0], state[i - 1][1]) abort nums[i] state[i][1] = max (state[i - 1][0], state[i - 1][1])

    OneEditDistance
    There are 3 possiblities to satisify one edit distance apart: Insert a character into s to get t, when slen < tlen Delete a character from s to get t, when slen > tlen Replace a character of s to get t, when slen = tlen
